1662950.name: Vittorio Corbo's Un-BEATable Demo
1662950.description:
Welcome to the demo to the un-BEATable game, in this bullet-hell done right you shall have an excruciating time trying to beat this grueling albeit rewarding game. By having to get shot to shoot at your enemies, you will have to weave through the playing music to defeat your enemies, or in this case the charming developer of this game... me.

Enjoy this short demo of the game, as I show you my witty writing and unfunny comedy as I make you beat this crunched demo.

Can you beat it?
1662950.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
